content.query:
USE transformed2_DB
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC CreateSQLview_transformed2 @ViewName NVARCHAR(100)
AS
BEGIN 

DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)
    
    SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW ' + @ViewName + ' As
        SELECT *
        FROM
        OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://salesdatadeproject.dfs.core.windows.net/transformeddata2/SalesLT/'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result] 
    '

EXEC (@statement)

END
GO
